changelog: v9.1.0: Enhanced DDSP (12 bio-mappings, spectral morphing, timbre transfer), Rausch-inspired bio-signal algorithms (BioEventGraph, HilbertSensorMapper, BioSignalDeconvolver), BioSignalDSP integrated into EchoelBio + EchoelVis, Android EngineBus port, extended BioSnapshot, 56 test suites

v9.0.0: EchoelToolkit — 498 classes consolidated into 11 unified Echoel* tools (EchoelSynth, EchoelFX, EchoelMix, EchoelSeq, EchoelMIDI, EchoelBio, EchoelVis, EchoelVid, EchoelLux, EchoelNet, EchoelAI + Echoela). Card-based tools section, updated specs and FAQ.
v8.0.1: Cache-busting query params on all assets, aggressive SW update checking, fixes CDN stale cache issue

v8.0.0: Complete CI rebuild — consistent nav/menu/footer on every page, zero inline styles on subpages, 1 CTA only (no page-cta, no mobile-cta, no Apple logos on subpages), shared.css as single source of truth
v7.1.0: Corporate Identity — pure grayscale on black, refined logo mark
v6.1.0: Inclusive font sizes + download CTA
